content.text:
# 2026 United States Senate election in Delaware

The 2026 United States Senate election in Delaware will be held on November 3, 2026, to elect a member of the United States Senate to represent the state of Delaware. Two-term Democrat Chris Coons was re-elected in 2020 with 59.4% of the vote, but has yet to indicate if he will run again in 2026.
Democratic primary
Candidates
Filed paperwork
* Chris Coons, incumbent senator
